review: Very happy with this purchase.  No set up really just plugged it into the USB port on the back of the TV and it did the rest. We did have to sign up for Netflix and HULU (which was way cheaper than our cable bill) and with those two we watch all kinds of stuff. Been trying out the amazon prime for a month for free and we have really liked that too. Overall we bought this to replace our cable bill and it has really paid off.
